title.rendered: 8 Way Tracking Lines Follower Module Infrared Detection

content.rendered: Infrared Detection: 8 channel IR detector hunting module with eight tracking module IR detection sensors, simple and easy to use. .8 Sensors In Total: D1-D8 mark on the module correspond to 8 sensors from left to right, clear and easy to read 1V Voltage Value Change Range: Use obstacles to cover the sensor, according to the distance of the obstacle, the voltage value of D1-D8 will decrease, and the range of change is within 1V. Power Supply: 3.3V-5V. .Analog Output: D1-D8 output mode is analog, normal high level after power on, possess stable connecting performance. .Excellent PCB: Good quality PCB materials have reliability and miniaturization, good maintenance and interchangeability

excerpt.rendered:
Operating voltage: 3.3 – 5.0 V; Supply current: 100 mA
Output format: 8 digital I/O-compatible signals that can be read as a timed high pulse
Product Size: 10x6x3cm

Optimal sensing distance: 0.125″ (3 mm)

8 Way Tracking Lines Follower Module Infrared Detection
